name: Joe Watson
profile:
This is a channel built to help you transform your life from where you are right now, to the place you want to be. You can do this by building an online business through content marketing, This includes how to build a blogging business.

My goal is to share clear, and extremely helpful information that will help you understand the industry, make money or build a business in the industry.

Goal: Help 10,000 people to create the lifestyle they want through business model that provides freedom and independence.

DISCLAIMER: I am NOT a financial advisor, and therefore all information and opinions expressed within all videos on this channel with regards to investing or stock markets should be used for entertainment purposes only. 

I advise to seek the advice of a professional before committing to any financial decisions.
